stretches.name: Neck Side Stretch
stretches.description: Gently tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder. Hold for 15 seconds each side.
instructions: Sit up straight with shoulders relaxed
Slowly tilt your head to the right, bringing ear toward shoulder
Hold for 15 seconds, feeling gentle stretch on left side of neck
Return to center and repeat on left side
cautions: Stop if you feel sharp pain

stretches.name: Shoulder Rolls
stretches.description: Roll your shoulders backward and forward in large, smooth circles.
instructions: Sit or stand with arms relaxed at sides
Pull shoulders back, squeezing shoulder blades together
Repeat 5 times backward, then 5 times forward

stretches.name: Chest Doorway Stretch
stretches.description: Stand in a doorway with arm against the frame, gently lean forward to stretch chest and shoulders.
instructions: Stand in doorway, place right forearm against door frame
Gently lean forward until you feel stretch in chest and shoulder

stretches.name: Seated Spinal Twist
stretches.description: Sit tall and twist your torso to one side, using the chair for support.
instructions: Sit sideways on chair with feet flat on floor
Place both hands on back of chair
Exhale and gently twist toward the chair back
Return to center and switch sides
cautions: Twist from the core, not forcing with arms
Avoid if you have spinal injuries

stretches.name: Wrist Flexor Stretch
stretches.description: Extend arm with palm up, gently pull fingers back to stretch the wrist and forearm.
instructions: Extend right arm forward, palm facing up
Use left hand to gently pull right fingers back toward you
cautions: Stop if numbness or tingling occurs

stretches.name: Wrist Extensor Stretch
stretches.description: Extend arm with palm down, gently pull hand down to stretch the top of the wrist.
instructions: Extend right arm forward, palm facing down
Use left hand to gently press right hand down

stretches.name: Cat-Cow Stretch (Chair)
stretches.description: Alternating between arching and rounding your spine while seated.
instructions: Sit forward on chair with feet flat, hands on knees
Inhale: Arch back, look up, chest forward (cow pose)
Exhale: Round back, tuck chin, pull belly in (cat pose)
Move smoothly between poses with breath
cautions: Avoid if you have severe back problems

stretches.name: Upper Trapezius Stretch
stretches.description: Tilt head diagonally and pull gently to stretch the upper trapezius muscle.
instructions: Sit with right hand behind back
Tilt head to left and slightly forward
Use left hand to gently pull head down

stretches.name: Seated Hip Stretch
stretches.description: Figure-4 stretch performed while seated to open the hips.
instructions: Sit on chair with feet flat on floor
Place right ankle on left knee
Lean forward slightly for deeper stretch
cautions: Keep foot flexed to protect knee
Avoid if you have hip problems

stretches.name: Standing Quadriceps Stretch
stretches.description: Stand on one leg and pull the other foot behind you to stretch the front thigh.
instructions: Stand near wall or desk for balance
Bend right knee and grab right foot behind you
Keep knees together and pelvis neutral

stretches.name: Ankle Circles
stretches.description: Rotate ankles in circles to improve circulation and flexibility.
instructions: Sit or stand, lift right foot slightly off ground

stretches.name: Shoulder Blade Squeeze
stretches.description: Squeeze shoulder blades together to strengthen upper back and improve posture.
instructions: Sit or stand with arms at sides

stretches.name: Eye Rest - Palming
stretches.description: Rest your eyes by covering them with warm palms to reduce eye strain.
instructions: Rub palms together to generate warmth
Cup palms over closed eyes without pressing
Breathe deeply and relax for 30-60 seconds

stretches.name: Desk Push-Up
stretches.description: Modified push-up using your desk to engage upper body and boost energy.
instructions: Place hands on edge of desk, shoulder-width apart

stretches.name: Standing Calf Stretch
stretches.description: Stretch calf muscles by stepping back and pressing heel down.
instructions: Stand facing wall, hands on wall
Step right leg back, keeping it straight

neck.name: Neck & Upper Spine
neck.description: Stretches for neck pain and tension headaches

shoulders.name: Shoulders & Upper Back
shoulders.description: Relieveounded shoulders and upper back tension

chest.name: Chest & Front Body
chest.description: Open chest muscles tight from hunching

back.name: Back & Spine
back.description: Spinal mobility and back pain relief

wrists.name: Wrists & Forearms
wrists.description: Prevent carpal tunnel and typing strain

hips.name: Hips & Lower Body
hips.description: Open tight hips from prolonged sitting

eyes.name: Eyes & Vision
eyes.description: Reduce digital eye strain and fatigue

quick_desk_reset.name: Quick Desk Reset
quick_desk_reset.description: Fast relief for common desk tension
